title: State Management
description: Nuxt provides powerful state management libraries and the useState composable to create a reactive and SSR-friendly shared state.

Most of the time, you will want to initialize your state with data that resolves asynchronously. You can use the

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight twoslash lsp
props.code:
<script setup lang="ts">
const websiteConfig = useState('config')

await callOnce(async () => {
  websiteConfig.value = await $fetch('https://my-cms.com/api/website-config')
})
</script>

Nuxt is not opinionated about state management, so feel free to choose the right solution for your needs. There are multiple integrations with the most popular state management libraries, including:
- state machine approach with tools for visualizing and testing your state logic
